caption.p: (A) Structure of compound N3 (B) 3D view of compound N3 inside the binding pocket of SARS-CoV-2 M pro (C) 3D interaction diagram of compound N3 with active site residues of the target protein (D) 2D interaction diagram compound N3 with active site residues of the target protein (PDB ID- 6LU7) (Visualized using Maestro visualizer) [70].
